content: **knitted hat and neck-warmer for children in drops big merino the piece is worked in stocking stitch with ribbed edges sizes 2 to 12 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the little trekker hat pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no mb-002-bn yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- * **whole set ** **sizes** 2 - 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/12 years child s height in cm 92 - 98/104 - 110/128 - 134/152 **materials** drops big merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-250-250-300 g colour 02 grey * **neck-warmer** **sizes** 2 - 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/12 years child s height in cm 92 - 98/104 - 110/128 - 134/152 **materials** drops big merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150-200-200 g colour 02 grey needles drops needle size 5 mm length 40 cm drops needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/40-32-a-little-trekker-hat
